question.title: Different Java version is detected by windows console
question.body:
Earlier I had installed JDK 21 on my machine and set the correct environment variable. Everything was working fine. Few days back due to a legacy project I had to uninstall and revert back to JDK8. After installing JDK8 I update my environment variables and restarted my machine.

But whenever I am ruing java -version and javac -version it is referring to Java 21.

If I check my windows registry I have correct path for java home.

Kindly take a note environment variables are correct. There is no spelling mistakes. In PATH I have %JAVA_HOME%\bin . Any guidance to fix this issue will be appreciated.

Path variable are
